Package elements

Class PointLight

java.lang.Object
elements.Light
elements.PointLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpotLight
public class PointLight
extends Light
implements LightSource
A class representing a point light source that illuminates around it in a spherical shape

  • Constructor Details

    • PointLight

      public PointLight​(Color intensity, Point3D position, double kC, double kL, double kQ)
      CTOR
      Parameters:
      intensity - the given intensity
      position - the given point-light's position
      kC - the given constant attenuation coefficient for light intensity
      kL - the given linear attenuation coefficient for light intensity
      kQ - the given quadratic attenuation coefficient for light intensity

    • PointLight

      Parameters:
      intensity - the given intensity
      position - the given light-source's position

    • getIntensity

      public Color getIntensity​(Point3D p)
      Method for calculating the point color according to the Pong model
      Specified by:
      getIntensity in interface LightSource
      Parameters:
      p - the given point
      Returns:
      the color at this point by this function: intensity = original-intensity / (kc + kl * d + kq * d ^ 2)

    • getL

      public Vector getL​(Point3D p)
      getter for direction vector from the point-light's position to the given point in the scene
      Specified by:
      getL in interface LightSource
      Parameters:
      p - the given point in the scene
      Returns:
      normalized direction vector from the point-light's position to the given point in the scene

    • getDistance

      public double getDistance​(Point3D point3D)
      Description copied from interface: LightSource
      calculate the distance from the light's position to the point given
      Specified by:
      getDistance in interface LightSource
      Parameters:
      point3D - the given point (probably a point on one of the scene's shape)
      Returns:
      the distance from the light's position to the point
